Spring Onion Crop.Description: Adds a crop for spring onions.

Ginger Crop.Description: Adds a late-game crop for ginger.

Sweet Pea Crop.Description: Adds a crop for sweet pea flowers.

Crocus Crop.Description: Adds a crop for crocus flowers.

Common Mushroom Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for common mushrooms (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Morel Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for morels (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Chanterelle Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for chanterelles (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Salmonberry Crop.Description: Adds a bush crop for salmonberries (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Blackberry Crop.Description: Adds a bush crop for salmonberries (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Holly Crop.Description: Adds a bush crop for holly (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Coffee Bush.Description: Turns coffee beans from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Blueberry Bush.Description: Turns blueberries from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Cactus Bush.Description: Turns cactus fruit from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Grape Bush.Description: Turns grapes from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Visually still looks like a trellis.

Hops Bush.Description: Turns hops from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Visually still looks like a trellis.

Hazelnut Tree.Description: Adds a tree sapling for hazelnuts.

Changes.FromFile: data/crops.json, data/fruittrees.json, data/objects.json, data/teabushes.json, data/shop_dwarf.json, data/shop_pierre.json, data/shop_islandtrader.json
